attributes.additional_details: The Sue Gray report has unveiled law breaking by those that make our laws in the United Kingdom. The British people voted and put their faith, hope and future in the hands of Boris Johnson who has, together with many others in Parliament, squandered the peoples' trust. Boris Johnson has broken the law and should take the honourable act of resigning.
attributes.background: In light of the Sue Gray report and its findings, it's clear the Prime Minister should should take responsibility for his actions and resign.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments. This includes calling for Ministers or MPs to be sacked, resign, or to be subject to a recall vote or a vote of no confidence.

You might like to sign the following petitions, which call for related actions:

Require MPs who break the law be removed from office
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614705

An MP found guilty of breaking any law is automatically subject to recall
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614888

We only reject petitions that don’t meet the petition standards.
